content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":125971,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません……ありがとうございました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me... thank you very much...\""},{"lineNumber":125972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、失礼しまぁす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm sorry to intrude...\""},{"lineNumber":125973,"originalJapaneseLine":"三人はぺこりと頭を下げて去って行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"The three bowed politely and then left."},{"lineNumber":125974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっはははははー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha—,"},{"lineNumber":125975,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人気者で羨ましいねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're so popular, I'm jealous—\""},{"lineNumber":125976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":125977,"originalJapaneseLine":"物憂げにお町が自分の乳房をそっと撫でる。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a melancholic look, Omachi gently stroked her own breast."},{"lineNumber":125978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　どったの、姐さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What's the matter, sis?\""},{"lineNumber":125979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの童-ﾜﾗﾍﾞ-たち……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those children...\""},{"lineNumber":125980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":125981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見たか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you see?\""},{"lineNumber":125982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「童が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The children...\""},{"lineNumber":125983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人があれほど気安く、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"People so easily,"},{"lineNumber":125984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我と話し、我に触れ、我に礼を言うた」","translatedEnglishLine":"talk to me, touch me, and express thanks to me.\""},{"lineNumber":125985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーだねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right—\""},{"lineNumber":125986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれほど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To that degree...\""},{"lineNumber":125987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我と戦い、我に怒り、我を怖れた人が」","translatedEnglishLine":"People who fought me, got angry at me, and feared me,"},{"lineNumber":125988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「同じ人でありながら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yet they are the same people...\""},{"lineNumber":125989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間だって色んなのがいるからね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because humans come in all sorts.\""},{"lineNumber":125990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気にしない子は気にしないもん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those who don't mind, just don't mind."},{"lineNumber":125991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　案外あんなもんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's surprisingly like that.\""},{"lineNumber":125992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so,"},{"lineNumber":125993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなもん、か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's just like that...\""},{"lineNumber":125994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……だが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...But\""},{"lineNumber":125995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、我は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But I...\""},{"lineNumber":125996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お町姐さんが昔ひどいことした人達と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The people who Omachi-sis treated badly in the past,"},{"lineNumber":125997,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの子達の間には、なーんの関係もないよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"have absolutely no relation to those kids—\""},{"lineNumber":125998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":125999,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、お町は優しいな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, Omachi is kind... "},{"lineNumber":126000,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って、政さんなら言う場面よね、これ」","translatedEnglishLine":"this is exactly what Masa-san would say, right?\""},{"lineNumber":126001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right...\""},{"lineNumber":126002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":126003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てかさー、それ言ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, if you say that,"},{"lineNumber":126004,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスの方が気安くない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"isn't Rance actually the one who's more familiar?\""},{"lineNumber":126005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is... "},{"lineNumber":126006,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああいう生き物だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"just that kind of creature.\""},{"lineNumber":126007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あははー、そりゃそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha, of course.\""},{"lineNumber":126008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日のこと後で政さんに教えてあげなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tell Masa-san about today later."},{"lineNumber":126009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと喜ぶよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"He'll surely be happy—\""},{"lineNumber":126010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":126011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、政宗が喜ぶか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, Masamune would be happy...\""},{"lineNumber":126012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃもう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Certainly."},{"lineNumber":126013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間と仲良く過ごしたなんて」","translatedEnglishLine":"To have spent time in harmony with humans—\""},{"lineNumber":126014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「政宗が喜ぶなら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If Masamune would be glad... "},{"lineNumber":126015,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……うむ、そうするとしようか」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm, then let's do that.\""},{"lineNumber":126016,"originalJapaneseLine":"お町がお湯に肩までつかり直す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Omachi sank back into the hot water up to her shoulders."},{"lineNumber":126017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":126018,"originalJapaneseLine":"長い溜め息を吐き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"She let out a long sigh."},{"lineNumber":126019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":126020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあ、お町」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Omachi.\""},{"lineNumber":126021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした、梵天丸」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's up, Bontenmaru?\""},{"lineNumber":126022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうして、こうなっている？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are things like this?\""},{"lineNumber":126023,"originalJapaneseLine":"お町は政宗を膝に抱えて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Omachi held Masamune on her lap,"},{"lineNumber":126024,"originalJapaneseLine":"後ろから抱きしめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"embracing him from behind."},{"lineNumber":126025,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭からぽっぽっとハートマークを出しながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"With heart marks popping above her head,"},{"lineNumber":126026,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぽ〜っとした朱色に染まった顔で","translatedEnglishLine":"her face flushed a gentle vermilion,"},{"lineNumber":126027,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗を愛しげに見つめている。","translatedEnglishLine":"she gazed at Masamune lovingly."},{"lineNumber":126028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今から丸二日、我らはこのまま……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on for a full two days, we will remain like this..."},{"lineNumber":126029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただひたすら体をくっつけ合って過ごす」","translatedEnglishLine":"simply spending time pressed together like this.\""},{"lineNumber":126030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません……ありがとうございました……」
三人はぺこりと頭を下げて去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three bowed politely and then left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気者で羨ましいねー」
物憂げにお町が自分の乳房をそっと撫でる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a melancholic look, Omachi gently stroked her own breast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我と話し、我に触れ、我に礼を言うた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: talk to me, touch me, and express thanks to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我と戦い、我に怒り、我を怖れた人が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People who fought me, got angry at me, and feared me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間だって色んなのがいるからね」
「気にしない子は気にしないもん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who don't mind, just don't mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お町姐さんが昔ひどいことした人達と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people who Omachi-sis treated badly in the past,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子達の間には、なーんの関係もないよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have absolutely no relation to those kids—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、政さんなら言う場面よね、これ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is exactly what Masa-san would say, right?"
"By the way, if you say that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの方が気安くない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't Rance actually the one who's more familiar?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいう生き物だからな」
「今日のこと後で政さんに教えてあげなよ。
人間と仲良く過ごしたなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To have spent time in harmony with humans—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町がお湯に肩までつかり直す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Omachi sank back into the hot water up to her shoulders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い溜め息を吐き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She let out a long sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町は政宗を膝に抱えて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Omachi held Masamune on her lap,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろから抱きしめていた。
頭からぽっぽっとハートマークを出しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With heart marks popping above her head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽ〜っとした朱色に染まった顔で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her face flushed a gentle vermilion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗を愛しげに見つめている。
「今から丸二日、我らはこのまま……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on for a full two days, we will remain like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただひたすら体をくっつけ合って過ごす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: simply spending time pressed together like this."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

三人はぺこりと頭を下げて去って行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three bowed politely and then left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気者で羨ましいねー」
物憂げにお町が自分の乳房をそっと撫でる。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い溜め息を吐き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She let out a long sigh.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Omachi held Masamune on her lap,

頭からぽっぽっとハートマークを出しながら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her face flushed a gentle vermilion,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on for a full two days, we will remain like this...
